'''Character Introductions''' are posts by [[miHoYo]] announcing new [[Characters]] on [[HoYoLAB]], Twitter, and Facebook. They include the [[:Category:Character Introduction Banners|Character Introduction Banner]], [[:Category:Character Introduction Cards|Character Introduction Card]], [[:Category:Character Cards|Character Card]], and introduction for the character including they name, title(s), [[element]], and [[region]].
